meanings.definition: The state of being the firstborn child in a family.
meanings.sent1: In some cultures, primogenitures have special responsibilities within the family.
meanings.sent2: The concept of primogenitures is important in many royal families.
meanings.sent3: The primogenitures in the family always get to choose the movie for family movie night.
meanings.sent4: Being the primogenitures can sometimes feel like carrying the weight of the world on your shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The primogenitures are like the leaders of the family, guiding the younger siblings.

meanings.definition: The right of the firstborn child to inherit the entire estate of their parents.
meanings.sent1: According to tradition, primogenitures receive the largest share of the inheritance.
meanings.sent2: The concept of primogenitures ensures that the family wealth stays within the bloodline.
meanings.sent3: The siblings joked that the primogenitures would end up with all the cookies from the cookie jar.
meanings.sent4: In the game of Monopoly, being the primogenitures means starting with the most properties.
meanings.sent5: The primogenitures eagerly awaited the reading of their parents' will to see what they would inherit.
